title: They can be saved
creator_credit: Greg Parry and Queensland. Dept. of Education
brief_description: An interview on location which looks at the work of the Queensland Beach Protection Authority. Discusses the causes of beach erosion and the ways of preventing future destruction.
creator_credit_for_label: Greg Parry and Queensland. Dept. of Education
